subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The quirky Islanders conceded perhaps their biggest business blunder in franchise history Wednesday when they gave up on Alexei Yashin, buying out the last four years of his 10-year contract.
snippet: The quirky Islanders conceded perhaps their biggest business blunder in franchise history Wednesday when they gave up on Alexei Yashin, buying out the last four years of his 10-year contract.
